summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ManyChat-like application. Backend APIs working excellently (92.3% success rate). Frontend fully functional with email/password authentication via API, dashboard access, Facebook page management, broadcast creation with images, and flow management. All core features tested successfully.

minor_issues.issue: Returns Facebook OAuth URL instead of demo mode
minor_issues.impact: Facebook OAuth is configured but frontend expects demo mode
minor_issues.note: This is actually working as intended - Facebook App ID is configured

integration_issues.issue: No visible email/password registration form in UI
integration_issues.impact: Users cannot register via frontend form, only through API
integration_issues.note: Backend email/password endpoints work perfectly, but frontend UI missing

positive_notes: Beautiful gradient design with proper branding

passed_tests: Token validation and user profile retrieval
Broadcast creation with text, images, and buttons
Arabic text rendering and RTL layout
action_item_for_main_agent: Add email/password registration and login forms to the frontend AuthPage component. The backend APIs are fully functional, but users need a UI to register and login without using Facebook OAuth. Consider adding a toggle between Facebook OAuth and email/password authentication modes.
